name: Astral Trials: Aspect of Pluto
description:
NOTE: VFX particles are not visible in the Web executable. To ensure the best experience, please download the game.  
Description

   Astral Trials: Aspect of Pluto is a 2D top-down puzzle videogame developed by a small group of friends. You will play as the "Aspect of Pluto", a wizard who has the ability to cast an elemental projectile. Your objective is to complete the different puzzles to complete the Astral Trials.

  Controls
  1. [WASD] to move
     
  2. [Left Mouse Button] to cast projectile
     
  3. [Esc] to pause the game
